mapper.select: SELECT tmp.userId, kidName, dosageId, symptom, medicineType, dosageVol, dosageCnt, dosageTime, storage, specialNote, createDate FROM (select userId, kidName from user where classCode = (select classCode from user where userId = #{userId}) and type = 1) as tmp, dosage WHERE tmp.userId = dosage.userId ORDER BY createDate DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT count(*) FROM (select userId from user where classCode = (select classCode from user where userId = #{userId}) and type = 1) as tmp, dosage WHERE tmp.userId = dosage.userId
